parameters.name: IncludeRule
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return the health check results of forwarding rules. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false** (default)

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **1** to **30**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token that determines the start point of the query. Valid values:

*   If this is your first query or no next queries are to be sent, ignore this parameter.
*   If a next query is to be sent, set the value to the value of **NextToken** that is returned from the last call.
